snippet.title: Round Two! Amber Heard and Johnny Depp Pack on the PDA While Walking the Red Carpet for The DanVideo
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp and wife Amber Heard got super affectionate while walking the red carpet together for the premiere of her film The Danish Girl at the 2015 Venice Film Festival on Saturday. 

The pair packed on the PDA as they posed for photographers, and even shared a romantic smooch. 

Heard, 29, and Depp, 52, were the picture of Hollywood glamor in complimentary looks. The actor wore a black tuxedo, while Heard donned a black floral printed, strapless gown.

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard at the Venice Film Festival
ELISABETTA A. VILLA / WIREIMAGE
The Danish Girl, which is already picking up rave reviews, tells the story of Lili Elbe, who was born Einar Wegener. Elbe, played by Oscar-winner Eddie Redmayne in the film, became one of the first people to undergo gender reassignment surgery. Heard portrays Oola Paulson, a ballet dancer close to Elbe's wife, played by Alicia Vikander.
